title: Rx Gauntlet Logging Schema - Transitive Framework References

beforeRxUpgrade.$comment: We might need multiple before/after pairs for different tests

afterRxUpgrade.description: The results after upgrading to the version of Rx.NET under test.

oldRxVersion.description: The old version of Rx. In normal tests, this will be a version known to cause bloat.

newRxVersion.description: The new or candidate version of Rx being tested.

tfm.description: The TFM for which the plug-in was built.

rxVersion.description: The version of Rx that the plug-in was built against.

rxFullAssemblyName.description: The full name of the Rx assembly used by the plug-in.

rxLocation.description: The filesystem location of the Rx assembly used by the plug-in.

rxTargetFramework.description: The target framework of the Rx assembly used by the plug-in (as described by its TargetFrameworkAttribute).

plugInlocation.description: The filesystem location of the plug-in assembly.

flowsCancellationTokenToOperationCancell.description: Indicates whether the plug-in found that Rx's Foreach correctly flows the CancellationToken to OperationCanceledException.

supportsWindowsForms.description: Indicates whether the plug-in supports Windows Forms.
